carnival_post_minigame: ^"Okay, okay! I’ll admit it—you’ve got skills."
rat_favorites: ^"Oh… wow. You really went all in on the deep-fried theme, huh?"
^"I mean, it’s a solid strategy… just maybe not my thing. But, hey! At least one of us is excited."
pigeon_favorites: ^"No way! A glow stick? A plastic bead necklace? Rocky, this is peak scavenging. It’s got a flair. It’s got style."
^"Oh, I think I’ve seen enough. I’m calling this a win."
neutral: ^"Hmm… interesting. A little bit of everything. Some sweet, some shiny, some salty. I respect the balance. You weren’t just thinking about yourself."
^"Let’s just say… I’m impressed. We’ll call it a tie."
